name: Boomerater
overview:
Boomerater.com is an online peer to peer advice network for Baby Boomers.

The objective of the site is to help Boomers make informed everyday and life decisions by tapping into the collective wisdom of other Boomers.

The free site covers everything from creative vacation ideas and great shopping buys, to career, financial and relocation tips, with all advice contributed exclusively by Boomers for Boomers.

Boomerater consists of forums where Boomers ask questions and impart advice on any topic and specialized sections that assist Boomers through the process of making specific decisions.

Specialized sections featured on Boomerater include:

  • Find a financial advisor: Boomers can explore a database of over 3,500 advisors and see which ones other Boomers recommend.
  • Search for vacation ideas: Boomers can discover great ideas for their next vacation by reading reviews about the travels of other Boomers.
  • Find the perfect place to live: Boomers can research more than 25,000 different places to relocate or retire and read how different towns have been rated.
  • Search for recommended shopping products: Boomers can find products recommended by other Boomeraters in themes such as â€œGadgets & Gizmosâ€ and â€œFit for Lifeâ€
